name: Bullet Killer
description:
A Bullet Hell Game where you have to be shot to survive.

You are the pilot of a new experimental ship featuring powerful shields capable of extracting energy from plasma bolts, while suffering no damage itself.  However, a fatal flaw in its design means that all of the ships power is being drained constantly. Having forgotten how to turn it off you are forced to engage in combat constantly in order to survive.

The game features 3 short stages and 3 unique enemy types, with plans to add more content after the game jam if it is well received.

Controls are explained in game under the help section.

This game was made in two days for the Game Maker's Tool Kit Game Jam (2018).
